CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local wndParent = UISelf:GetParent() local idx = UISelf:GetBuildIndex() for i=0,2 do local wndOther = wndParent:GetControl("CBTN_POST"..i) if false == wndOther:IsNil() then wndOther:CheckState(idx==i) wndOther:LockClick(idx==i) end local wndPost = wndParent:GetControl("FRM_POST"..i) if false == wndPost:IsNil() then wndPost:Visible(idx==i) if idx==i and 2==i then local lst = wndPost:GetControl("LST_INV") if 0>= lst:GetListItemCount() then lst:AddNewListItemChar("") end local item = lst:ListFirstItem() local wnd = item:GetWnd(); local Ele = wnd:GetControl("FRM_INVEN0") if false == Ele:IsNil() then CanAddToMail(Ele) end end end end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if CheckedMailCount(UISelf:GetParent():GetParent()) > 0 then CallUI("SFRM_MSG_DEL_MAIL", true) else AddWarnDataTT(939) end
if CheckedMailCount(UISelf:GetParent():GetParent()) > 0 then GetAnnexAll() else AddWarnDataTT(939) end
if CheckedMailCount(UISelf:GetParent():GetParent()) > 0 then CallYesNoMsgBox( GetTT(962), GUID(), MBT_CONFIRM_RETURN_MAIL_ALL ) else AddWarnDataTT(939) end

local bg = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_LIST_BG") local list = bg:GetControl("LST_TO") if false==bg:IsNil() then local bv = bg:IsVisible() if true==bv then bg:Visible(false) else local count = g_FriendMgr:Friend_Count() if 0 >= count then bg:Visible(false) else bg:Visible(true) list:ClearAllListItem() for i=0,count do local friend = g_FriendMgr:FriendItem_ByAt(i) if false == friend:IsNil() then list:AddNewListItem(friend:CharacterName()) end end local size = math.min(4,count) local pt = Point2(list:GetSize():GetX(), size*22) list:SetSize(pt) bg:GetControl("IMG_BOTTOM"):SetLocation(Point2(-1, pt:GetY())) pt:IncY(6) bg:SetSize(pt) bg:SetImgSize(pt) end end end return true

FORM.SCRIPT: local self = UISelf if self:GetParent():IsVisible() then local eText = self:GetParent():GetEditText() self:SetStaticText(eText:Length() .. "/200") end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local wndParent = UISelf:GetParent() local wndOther = wndParent:GetControl("CBTN_REQ_MONEY") if false == wndOther:IsNil() then wndOther:CheckState(false) wndOther:LockClick(false) UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) wndParent:GetControl("FRM_TEXT4"):SetStaticTextW(GetTextW(922)) end

local wndParent = UISelf:GetParent() local wndOther = wndParent:GetControl("CBTN_SEND_MONEY") if false == wndOther:IsNil() then wndOther:CheckState(false) wndOther:LockClick(false) UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) wndParent:GetControl("FRM_TEXT4"):SetStaticTextW(GetTextW(921)) end

FORM.SCRIPT: local kEditTo=UISelf:GetControl("EDT_TO") if not kEditTo:IsNil() then kEditTo:SetCustomDataAsInt(0) end
local kEditTo=UISelf:GetControl("EDT_TO") if not kEditTo:IsNil() then local cust = kEditTo:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then kEditTo:SetEditFocus(true) kEditTo:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local bg = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_LIST_BG") local list = bg:GetControl("LST_TO") if false==bg:IsNil() then local bv = bg:IsVisible() if true==bv then bg:Visible(false) else local count = g_FriendMgr:Friend_Count() if 0 >= count then bg:Visible(false) else bg:Visible(true) list:ClearAllListItem() for i=0,count do local friend = g_FriendMgr:FriendItem_ByAt(i) if false == friend:IsNil() then list:AddNewListItem(friend:CharacterName()) end end local size = math.min(5,count) local pt = Point2(list:GetSize():GetX(), size*22) list:SetSize(pt) bg:GetControl("IMG_BOTTOM"):SetLocation(Point2(-1, pt:GetY())) pt:IncY(6) bg:SetSize(pt) bg:SetImgSize(pt) end end end return true

FORM.SCRIPT: UISelf:Visible(false) local kEditTo=UISelf:GetControl("EDT_TO") if not kEditTo:IsNil() then kEditTo:SetCustomDataAsInt(0) end
local kEditTo=UISelf:GetControl("EDT_TO") if not kEditTo:IsNil() then kEditTo:SetCustomDataAsInt(0) end
local kEditTo=UISelf:GetControl("EDT_TO") if not kEditTo:IsNil() then local cust = kEditTo:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then kEditTo:SetEditFocus(true) kEditTo:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local parent = UISelf:GetParent():GetParent() local edit_to = parent:GetParent():GetControl("EDT_TO") if false==edit_to:IsNil() then edit_to:SetEditTextW(UISelf:GetStaticText()) end parent:Visible(false) return OnKey_Post_Enter(UISelf:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent(), "EDT_TITLE")

BUTTON.HOTKEY: CallYesNoMsgBox( GetTT(965), GUID(), MBT_CONFIRM_DELETE_MAIL, UISelf:GetParent():GetCustomDataAsInt() ) return true

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local t = UISelf:GetStaticText() local t_y = 55-t:Length()*0.5 local tpos = UISelf:GetTextPos() tpos:SetY(t_y) UISelf:SetTextPos(tpos)
